Class StorageModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.cmput301t02project.model.StorageModel

  • public class StorageModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Deals with storing data on the server and caching data locally.

    • Method Detail

      • pushComment

        public void pushComment(CommentModel comment)
        Push a comment online.

        Converts a specified CommentModel to JSON for for storing on the web. Pushes the specified CommentModel to the web. Used when a comment is created in CreateCommentActivity.

        Parameters:
        comment - CommentModel to be pushed

      • cacheComment

        public void cacheComment(CommentModel comment)
        Caches a comment locally.

        Caches a specified CommentModel on the user's local device. Used when a comment is read or favorited in BrowseTopLevelCommentsActivity and BrowseReplyCommentsActivity.

        Parameters:
        comment - CommentModel to cache

      • getLatest

        public CommentModel getLatest()
        Not fully implemented - added for testing for this release only.
        Returns:
        CommentModel containing the current location

      • getCacheList

        public java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> getCacheList()
        Returns a list of the cached comments.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of cached CommentModels
